name: AWS SageMaker
description: Import AWS SageMaker training jobs, batch transform jobs, processing jobs, and ML pipelines for machine learning workflow orchestration.
author: Dagster Community

outputs.description: Generates assets for each SageMaker entity

aws_access_key_id.label: Access Key ID
aws_access_key_id.description: AWS access key ID (optional if using IAM role)

aws_secret_access_key.label: Secret Access Key
aws_secret_access_key.description: AWS secret access key (optional if using IAM role)

aws_session_token.label: Session Token
aws_session_token.description: AWS session token for temporary credentials (optional)

import_training_jobs.label: Import Training Jobs
import_training_jobs.description: Import training job definitions as materializable assets

import_transform_jobs.label: Import Transform Jobs
import_transform_jobs.description: Import batch transform job definitions as materializable assets

import_processing_jobs.label: Import Processing Jobs
import_processing_jobs.description: Import processing job definitions as materializable assets

import_pipelines.label: Import Pipelines
import_pipelines.description: Import ML pipeline definitions as materializable assets

filter_by_tags.label: Filter by Tags
filter_by_tags.description: Comma-separated tag keys to filter entities

generate_sensor.label: Generate Observation Sensor
generate_sensor.description: Create sensor to observe completed jobs and pipelines

group_name.label: Asset Group
group_name.description: Group name for all imported assets

description.label: Description
description.description: Description for the AWS SageMaker component
